body. So you cannot ever be unplugged from him.” I imagine you would
regard this as outrageous, which suggests that something really is wrong
with that plausible-sounding argument I mentioned a moment ago.
In this case, of course, you were kidnapped; you didn’t volunteer for the
operation that plugged the violinist into your kidneys. Can those who oppose
abortion on the ground I mentioned make an exception for a pregnancy due
to rape? Certainly. They can say that persons have a right to life
